application.views

Class MainMenuView

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.views.MainMenuView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UIComponent

    public class MainMenuView
extends java.lang.Object
implements UIComponent
    View for the main menu. Also includes views for each button that can be clicked
    Author:
    Roy
